name: Clacker
description:
Clacker is a 10 level puzzle game written in STOS. Clacker is the name of the main assembly droid in the factory of the Cosmic engineers. You have to help this droid fulfill his workload. What you have to is assemble blocks (clacks) into the specific shapes required by each level. The required shape can be 3-in-a-row or Box for example. The game area consists of two 5 x 5 squares divided by the space where Clanker moves and new blocks appears. Speed is of the essence since being too slow will make Clanker lose efficiency points and if the efficiency points reaches zero it's game over.

At the left side of the screen you can see how many clanks you have left to combine and at the right side of the screen you can see the efficiency-meter.
